channel.title: CVE Feed for Hitron Systems -- all
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Hitron Systems -- all products

item.title: CVE-2024-22771|2024-08-01T22:51:11.148Z -- hitron%20systems -- dvr%20lguvr-4h
item.description: Improper Input Validation in Hitron Systems DVR LGUVR-4H 1.02~4.02 allows an attacker to cause network attack in case of using defalut admin ID/PW.
